line_1: As active Spring awak'd her Infant Buds;
line_2: And genial Life inform'd the verdant Woods;

line_1: When lintwhites chant amang the buds,
line_2: O sweet are COILA'S haughs an' woods,

line_1: When lintwhites chant amang the buds,
line_2: And jinkin hares, in amorous whids,

line_1: When lintwhites chant amang the buds,
line_2: While thro' the braes the cushat croods
Feed with the dulcet drops my tender broods,

line_1: Should push, in Spring, ten thousand thousand Buds;
line_2: And boast returning Leaves, and blooming Woods?
